metadata.title: Premium Solid Seat Insert for Wheelchair, Foam
features: Premium Solid Seat Insert measures 18" wide x 16" deep x 1 1/4" thick
Constructed of firm water proof closed cell crosslink polyethylene foam that is easy to clean; provides a level and firm base for a wheelchair cushion
Lightweight; features a convex bottom with a flat top for comfortable use
Distributes a user's weight evenly to create a stable seating surface; enhances the effect of the wheelchair seat upholstery
Sold individually; competitively priced while ensuring long-lasting use and superior durability
description: Rehabilitation Advantage Premium Solid Seat Insert is wonderful to have when your wheelchair seat sags or has an uneven surface. It is designed to create a level seat for all users. This insert will take the strain off your back, while providing the proper support needed to sit comfortably all day long. The level surface, created by this insert, also assists in the prevention of sliding forward. The design of this insert adds relief and comfort without adding overwhelming height to your chair. Overall, this Solid Seat Insert can be used in several different applications, such as wheelchairs, office chairs, dining room chairs, in automobiles and much more. Feel free to use in the hospital or nursing home, at home, in the office, or when traveling. This insert will make the user feel more comfortable, as well as more "in control" of their position. Purchase yours today! âš  WARNING: Cancer and Reproductive Harm
